H1.text: what kind of music did franz liszt compose. Chamber Music

A4.text: He also wrote for orchestra and for other ensembles.

A5.text: he also wrote transcriptions and paraphrases as well as sacred vocal music.

A6.text: The symphonic poem invented by Liszt had the main theme heard at the start of the piece, then develop through thematic transformation, never leaving behind musical coherence.

A7.text: Liszt found his method through two compositional practices, which he used in his symphonic poems.
